nodes.text: The Rally 1300 was a 1300 light-year, multi-day space rally held during the Imperial Era and open only to YT-1300 light freighters. It tested the endurance of the participants' freighters as well as the crews' ability to navigate dangerous hyperspace routes and pilot their starship through a series of realspace challenges.
Rally 1300 was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders.
